name: Daily Digests
description: Morning brief for superintendents and optional end-of-day summary with configurable delivery preferences.

prd.problemStatement: Superintendents need consistent daily updates, while optional end-of-day summaries help track completion. Configurable digests support different workflow preferences.
userStories: As a superintendent, I want a morning digest so that I start my day informed
As a superintendent, I want an end-of-day summary so that I can review accomplishments
